name: CENTROPYMUSIC
blurb: MUSIC WITH MEANING!  MUSIC THAT MATTERS!!!

name: ANTHROPIA : New album based on Cthulhu Mythos
blurb: Help us release "Non-Euclidean Spaces", our new album based on Cthulhu Mythos, featuring Arjen Lucassen & Edu Falaschi.

name: CURVE: The debut album from Miroist needs awesome merch
blurb: Pre-order and help me fund new merchandise so we can make the album release something amazing.

name: Ninja Musicology - A musical tribute to The Last Ninja™games
blurb: Triple tribute album with rock/metal covers of themes from The Last Ninja™ game series, a live concert and concert Blu-Ray.

name: Sergeant Thunderhoof - 'Ride of the Hoof' on Vinyl
blurb: Want to get your hands on a tasty double vinyl set of our latest album 'Ride of the Hoof'? Please help us make it a reality.

name: Yet Further: Sioum's Second Full-Length Album
blurb: Help Chicago-based instrumental group Sioum complete the production of their 2nd full-length album.

name: Boston Typewriter Orchestra's New Album
blurb: Help the Boston Typewriter Orchestra release its latest EP "Termination Without Prejudice" on vinyl for all the audiophiles out there.

name: Disharmonic Orchestra - Fear of Angst
blurb: DISHARMONIC ORCHESTRA are going to release their long awaited 5th full lenght album. They need your help to get it finalized.

name: The New Album: Dig Deeper
blurb: Five metal heads dedicated to our passion for music. We believe music is Freedom, Unity & Escape. Join us on our mission to Dig Deeper.

name: Anna Fiori: New Album
blurb: Help fund my second solo album! | Mexican Symphonic / Prehispanic Metal | ¡Forma parte de la producción de mi segundo álbum solista!

name: El Cuervo de Poe: Ciudad sin memoria
blurb: ¡Ya llegamos a nuestra primer meta: $50,000! Ahora vamos por los $60,000 y por el concierto online para ustedes lml

name: Chaos Games || Pulverise's Debut Album
blurb: WE MADE AN ALBUM! YAS! It's a rap metal groove beasty that that will devour your ears! Can you help us unleash it into the wild?

name: Sumeru - 'Summon Destroyer' 12" Vinyl Pressing Campaign
blurb: Legions! Join our Kickstarter campaign to see our latest album, 'Summon Destroyer', get the vinyl treatment we feel it so deserves.

name: Pat Reilly (Pat the Panther) 2019 Full Length Album
blurb: A Dynamic, Melodic, Emotionally Charged Instrumental Hybrid Guitar Album.

name: Parallel Eternity: The 10th Anniversary Album
blurb: Parallel Eternity, an orchestral metal double-album celebrating ten years of A Sound of Thunder and featuring composer Brad Charles.

name: The Blind Ivy Tour [Official Film/Documentary 2018]
blurb:
The full length feature documentary film capturing Blind Ivy's Tour of 10 cities & NEW MERCH
#GODLESS

blurb: My third full-length album! REIMAGINE.

name: Japanese Metal Queen ready to make a comeback after 13 years
blurb: 3rd Album Recording  （日本人メタル歌手 13年振りのカムバック：３rd アルバム・レコーディング）

name: Anna Pest "Dark Arms Reach Skyward" CD Release
blurb: Canadian metal producer Anna Pest is planning a CD release for her new album, “Dark Arms Reach Skyward With Bone White Fingers."

name: Maledictis
blurb: An EP of Symphonic Metal, written and recorded internationally by quarantined musicians.

name: Dark Souls Inspired Rock EP
blurb: 4 tracks featuring themes from Dark Souls 3 and packed with original music, lyrics and Artwork.

name: Un Kickstarter per ripartire - Nebulae + Hellucination live
blurb:
Un live in data 30 Ottobre a Roma, solo al raggiungimento del primo obiettivo di 375 euro. 
Per uno show in piena sicurezza.

name: Diapause by Dream Static
blurb: Diapause will be a full length darkwave synth industrial metal album & a battle cry against the growing spread of Fascism in America

name: Pitchshifter 1998 Tour Diary Book
blurb: A limited-edition, hardback book of J.S. Clayden's 1998 tour diary.

name: Pitchshifter "Live in Japan" Vinyl Album
blurb: Limited edition coloured vinyl album of Pitchshifter live in Japan in October 1998.

name: Raise The Black Flag // My Eyes Fall Victim's final record
blurb: Help support a limited vinyl pressing and a run of album-themed apparel for My Eyes Fall Victim's final record, Raise the Black Flag,

name: Minorarc "Untold" Album - Limited Expanded Edition
blurb:
Dark pianos, heavy strings, ambience and djent aggression. 
Pre-order our 2022 album release. Expanded edition only available here.

name: Delicta: A Fugue For the Betrayed
blurb: Delicta is the new single by Gothic Chamber Metal project, Maledictis.

name: VOLFGANG TWINS WOLF PATH & WOLF MOUNTAIN Twin Pack Album Set
blurb: Modern ambient percussive Viking style music inspired by archaic Germanic mythology.  Two complete albums by The Volfgang Twins.

name: Long Way From Neverland - Niovel's New Album On CD
blurb: Let's embark on a new journey.
